00038         public function editmap($mapno=-1) {
00039                 /* If no map number is specified on the command line, and
00040                  * no post data has been sent, we display a blank form to create a new map.
00041                  * If a map number is specified on the command line, we display a form
00042                  * populated with the data for the pre-existing map 'mapno'.
00043                  * If post data is present, the user has submitted the form after editing
00044                  * the map specification, so we add it to the edit queue.
00045                  */
00046                 $this -> load -> view('header_view');
00047 
00048                 if(!$this -> input -> post('submit')) {
00049                         if($mapno == -1) {
00050                                 // create new map
00051                                 $data = $this -> map_model -> get_default_map();
00052                         } else {
00053                                 $data = $this -> map_model -> get_map($mapno);
00054                         }
00055                 } else {

00057                         //$passwd = $this->input->post('passwd');
